titleStmt.title: From the Insurance-Office for Houses, on the back-side of the Royal-Exchange
titleStmt.author: Insurance Office for Houses (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: The propositions at large are to be had gratis at Mr. Starkey's ... Mr. Hinchman's ... and at the Office ...,

notesStmt.note: Top border possibly cropped; Wing lists title as: September, the 16th. 1681. An advertisement from the insurance-office for houses.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
